ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, such a tactic is definitely PvP because a NPC you either want to fight or don t. If you do you walk up to it and bash it, cause waiting for it to wander
ygData.messageBody:
Well, such a tactic is definitely PvP because a NPC you either want to
fight or don't. If you do you walk up to it and bash it, cause waiting
for it to wander into your ambush will take forever, and if you don't
you walk away from it, or run as the case may be.

But for the record, minor illusion is a self only spell, invisibility
would work better. Though a group of skeleton arms lieing on the ground
to ambush some unsuspecting group on Rallos Zek sounds interesting,
they'd all have to be enchanters, and a group of enchanters without any
other classes would get wiped as soon as the 'victims' realized what
was up, and started whacking those mysterious skeleton arms.

--- Wizard LABBS <wizard-labbs@...> wrote:
> I have been playing an enchanter for 7 Levels now
> and I must admit that the enchanter is one of the
> best classes in the game. I am very interested in
> jiong up with 5 other enchanters and taking the show
> on the road. WIht out unique spells we are perfectly
> suited to be spys or ever assasins for hire. We can
> lure enemies into an area as the rest of the group
> hides using minor illusion and then poof we can
> attack. They will never know what hit them. What do
> you think?
>
> PS
> I'm not talking about blidly PKing people I am just
> talking about stratigies for use with any enemy.
>
> Thanks
> Mushin
>
>
>
